::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: objectives

```{r, message = FALSE}

# Required packages
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(cowplot)
library(grafify)
library(rstan)

# Set graphical theme
theme_set(theme_bw(15))

# Set color scheme
```
